action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Religious Freedom Restoration Act of 1993 to eliminate the applicability of such Act to the District of Columbia.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the District of Columbia Non-Discrimination Home Rule Act of 2025.

section.header: Elimination of applicability of Religious Freedom Restoration Act to the District of Columbia
